name: Dungeon Disposal
description:
Dungeon Disposal is a game created for Friday Night Game Jam #2020-40.

STORY

You play as a knight who is set on disposal duty in the dungeon. It has been infested by monsters! Be careful, as their spit is very harmful.

Credits

Almost all assets used were from asset packs created by Chasers Gaming. Their assets are pretty neat for most of them being free check em out.
